resources.string:
To play, choose the difficulty and press the "Play" button. The game is to find the number shown on the screen. To do this, you have to click on the buttons at the bottom of the screen. If you press a button that is not correct, a point will be deducted. If you press the correct button, a point will be added to you. If you press the correct button, a point will be added to you. If you press the correct button, a point will be added to you. If you press the correct button, a point will be added to you.
